statements: DELETE FROM order_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND order_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM order_history WHERE order_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201;
DELETE FROM order_history WHERE payment_status = 'pending' AND total_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 200 AND product_id = 500;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND customer_id = 200
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE product_id = 500 AND quantity < 10
DELETE FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock <= 10 AND unit_price > 50;
